subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup lifted itself out of the doldrums Friday as some of the world’s fastest yachts finally began racing after four days of delays because of a lack of wind.
snippet: The America’s Cup lifted itself out of the doldrums Friday as some of the world’s fastest yachts finally began racing after four days of delays because of a lack of wind.
